entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 in the Port aux Basques area. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 03 March 2023
